item.title: ACL privileges
item.description: ##Linux之用户管理与权限控制（下） 2.组管理命令 a、groupadd groupadd命令用来创建组。 groupadd - create a new group synopsis: groupadd [options] group options: -g : 指定GI

Huabing Zhao is an ICT veteran with a passion for open source. He has a solid experience in the telecommunication and information technology industry for more than 17 years. Throughout his career, he has built a number of large-scale, cross-country OSS/BSS platforms/systems and operation tools, most of them are still running in productions. He also loves open source and has been contributing to a variety of open source projects, including Istio(Service Mesh https://istio.
